statements: SELECT * FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, travel_date, fare FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE route_id = 101 ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT start_station, end_station, fare FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE fare > 20 ORDER BY fare DESC;
SELECT user_id, start_station, end_station FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT route_id, fare FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE start_station = 'Station A' AND end_station = 'Station B';
SELECT user_id, route_id, travel_date, start_station, end_station, fare FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT start_station, end_station, fare FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE route_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY fare DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_trips, start_station FROM public_transportation_usage GROUP BY start_station ORDER BY total_trips DESC;
SELECT user_id, route_id, travel_date, fare FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE start_station = 'StationA' OR end_station = 'StationB' ORDER BY travel_date ASC, fare DESC;
SELECT AVG(fare) AS avg_fare, MAX(fare) AS max_fare, MIN(fare) AS min_fare FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE route_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT user_name, user_age FROM public_transportation_users WHERE total_rides >= 50;
SELECT user_id, user_name, total_rides FROM public_transportation_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_age, total_rides FROM public_transportation_users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_rides WHERE start_location = 'Station A';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_users WHERE user_age > 30 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_age FROM public_transportation_users WHERE user_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT DISTINCT user_age, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM public_transportation_users GROUP BY user_age HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_users DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, r.start_location, r.end_location FROM public_transportation_users u INNER JOIN public_transportation_rides r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.start_location = 'City A' AND r.end_location = 'City B';
SELECT AVG(user_age) AS average_age FROM public_transportation_users;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_users;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_age FROM public_transportation_users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT route_name, route_type, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_trips FROM route_usage_stats GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_name AS Name, usage_date AS Date, number_of_trips AS Trips FROM public_transportation_users JOIN route_usage_stats ON public_transportation_users.user_id = route_usage_stats.user_id;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_users WHERE user_age > 25;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type='bus';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM public_transportation_users WHERE user_age = 30 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM route_usage_stats WHERE number_of_trips >= 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;

SELECT u.user_name, r.route_name, rs.usage_date FROM public_transportation_users u JOIN route_usage_stats rs ON u.user_id = rs.user_id JOIN transportation_routes r ON r.route_id = rs.route_id WHERE r.route_type='train';
SELECT * FROM public_transport_stops;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM public_transport_stops ORDER BY stop_name;
SELECT route_name, frequency FROM public_transport_routes WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT stop_name, total_passengers FROM public_transport_stops WHERE total_passengers < 100 ORDER BY total_passengers DESC;
SELECT route_id, total_passenger_count, average_frequency FROM route_statistics;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_stops WHERE total_passengers > 100 ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(total_passengers) AS max_passengers, MIN(total_passengers) AS min_passengers FROM public_transport_stops;
SELECT stop_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM passenger_records JOIN public_transport_stops ON passenger_records.stop_id = public_transport_stops.stop_id GROUP BY stop_name;
SELECT route_name, route_description, frequency FROM public_transport_routes WHERE frequency BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT route_name, total_passenger_count, average_frequency FROM route_statistics ORDER BY average_frequency DESC, total_passenger_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM Users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Stations WHERE station_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT route_name, frequency FROM Routes WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE frequency > 10 AND vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT user_name, ticket_type, ticket_price FROM Users JOIN Tickets ON Users.user_id = Tickets.user_id;
SELECT station_name, location FROM Stations WHERE ST_Distance(location, 'POINT(2 3)') < 10;
